pkgmetadata.longdescription: Food Network Inference and Visualization // Displays a weighted undirected food graph from an adjacency matrix. Can perform confidence-interval bootstrap inference with mutual information or maximal information coefficient. Based on my Master 1 internship at the Bordeaux Population Health center. References : Reshef et al. (2011) doi:10.1126/science.1205438, Meyer et al. (2008) doi:10.1186/1471-2105-9-461, Liu et al. (2016) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0158247.
